wordpressWpDailyReads.title: Daily Reads 8/21/2019
wordpressWpDailyReads.content:
Hi, everyone. Today we get an update on Trump’s consideration of tax levies to help boost the economy. Despite falling subscribership across news outlet organizations, the Athletic has become a bright spot in growing subscriptions. The new trend in ‘adult recess’ has many professionals reaching back their childhood activities for much-needed stress relief. We look at the podcast revolution that’s taking place with the likes of Conan O’Brien joining the ranks of successful podcasters. And the long-awaited Matrix 4 is slated for production with core cast members expected to return.

ECONOMY

Trump Administration Mulling Tax Cuts to Boost the Economy

President Donald Trump said Tuesday that he’s looking at cutting Americans’ payroll taxes or other levies as a way to boost a U.S. economy that some experts fear is lurching toward recession.

 

BUSINESS

The Sports News Site Haters Love to Dunk on Keeps Signing Up Subscribers

Alex Mather would like you to know that he loves newspapers. He’s loved them since he was a kid growing up in Philadelphia.

 

HEALTH

‘Adult Recess’ Is Booming, Because Being a Grown-Up Is Hard Is

People are reliving schoolyard memories with tetherball, hopscotch and Lincoln Logs, despite sore muscles and tweaked knees

 

ENTERTAINMENT

How Conan O’Brien and Other Top Hosts Are Tapping Into the Podcast Revolution

Despite its star’s initial reservations, “Conan O’Brien Needs a Friend,” an interview program in which the late-night comic engages in free-form chats with everyone from “Barry” creator Bill Hader to historian and Pulitzer Prize-winning author Robert Caro, has become the breakout hit of the audio season.

 

‘Matrix 4’ Officially a Go With Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss

Warner Bros. has been trying for the last of couple years to find a way to get back into “The Matrix” universe, but a hold-up over producing rights slowed the project down.
